channel.title: Docs on Applied ML with Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Applied ML with Coffee

item.title: AWS
item.description: Starting/Stopping Notebook Instance with AWS CLI # Start Instance aws sagemaker \ start-notebook-instance \ --notebook-instance-name "ML-case-studies" # Get URL || NOTE: When you visit this URL u'll have to login (if you didn't do it before) aws sagemaker \ describe-notebook-instance \ --notebook-instance-name "ML-case-studies" | jq '.Url' # Stop Instance aws sagemaker \ stop-notebook-instance \ --notebook-instance-name "ML-case-studies"
